availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Willis Marion Hughes (Clark County, IN, resident)

body.p: Clark County, Indiana, resident. Indiana native. Son of Eleven Hughes and Barbara McNay Hughes. Attended school in Clark County, Indiana, in 1850. Resident of Clark County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Charlestown, p. 121A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Charlestown Township, p. 174.
War of 1812 Pension and Bounty Land Warrant Application Files, NARA RG 15, Roll RG15-1812PB-Bx1786.
"W. M. Hughes (1836-1901)," Find A Grave, Memorial 54391439, accessed May 16, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/54391439.
KYR-0001-006-0047.
